title: How to Beat Derby Harrington in Bully

steps.headline: Start the "Boxing Challenge" mission and enter the Glass Jaw Boxing Club.
You will start a boxing match with Bif.
steps.description: Close in on him and repeatedly punch him until he starts blocking.

steps.headline: Once he starts blocking, stop punching him and hold the block button.
When he is about to perform a charged punch on you, dodge.
Repeat steps 2-4 until Bif runs out of health.
steps.description: When he is dazed, close in on him and hold down the punch button to knock him out.

steps.headline: The battle with Derby will now start.
steps.description: Defeat the Preps in the boxing room by repeatedly punching each of them.

steps.headline: Buy soda from the soda machine to restore your health.
Destroy a chair and pick up the broken wood as a clubbing weapon.
Go upstairs and enter the door.
Derby will begin to fight you himself, along with two of his friends.
steps.description: Drop the wood and knock out his friends by repeatedly punching them.

steps.headline: Club Derby with the wood until it breaks.
Lock onto Derby and repeatedly perform fully-charged slingshot shots while circle-strafing around him.

text: Start the "Boxing Challenge" mission and enter the Glass Jaw Boxing Club.  You will start a boxing match with Bif. Close in on him and repeatedly punch him until he starts blocking. Once he starts blocking, stop punching him and hold the block button.  When he is about to perform a charged punch on you, dodge.  Repeat steps 2-4 until Bif runs out of health. When he is dazed, close in on him and hold down the punch button to knock him out. The battle with Derby will now start. Defeat the Preps in the boxing room by repeatedly punching each of them. Buy soda from the soda machine to restore your health.  Destroy a chair and pick up the broken wood as a clubbing weapon.  Go upstairs and enter the door.  Derby will begin to fight you himself, along with two of his friends. Drop the wood and knock out his friends by repeatedly punching them. Pick up the wood.  Club Derby with the wood until it breaks.  Equip the Super Slingshot.  Lock onto Derby and repeatedly perform fully-charged slingshot shots while circle-strafing around him. Continue until he is defeated.
